desc: Project Ailey is a virtual human project, a celebrity who lives and moves in a virtual space and will be active in spaces such as games, movies, and metaverse in the future.
mobile-desc: Project Ailey is a virtual human project, a celebrity who lives and moves in a virtual space and will be active in spaces such as games, movies, and metaverse in the future.

cards.title: Ailey 01
cards.desc: Ailey is born by breaking the shell and living her own life in Aileyverse, the metaverse space.

cards.title: Ailey 02
cards.desc: Ailey is given a unique look and personality from birth.

cards.title: Ailey 03
cards.desc: You can interact with Ailey, educate her and make her more lively.

cards.title: Ailey 04
cards.desc: Ailey can be a celebrity or simply your friend through various experiences in Aileyverse.

cards.title: Ailey 05
cards.desc: Ailey is the most advanced meta-human.
